description: Senator John Le Fondre survives calls for him to stand down from leading the Government of Jersey.
title: Jersey chief minister no-confidence vote fails
title_page: Jersey chief minister no-confidence vote fails - BBC News
maintext: The chief minister said the issue had been "mentally and emotionally" draining for him, his colleagues and his family, arguing the public's response to the issue had been part of an "orchestrated campaign" against his government.
